values: To rip something means to pull it apart.
She ripped the paper in half by accident.
n. 裂口，裂缝RIPabbr. rest in peace 愿灵安眠
时态:ripped, ripping, rips名 词:ripper

n.裂口,废物,美国俚语偷窃,浪子vt.& vi.扯破，撕坏vt.撕成,锯,猛地扯开,拆（衣服）vi.裂开，绽线
n.裂口,废物,美国俚语偷窃,浪子vt.& vi.扯破，撕坏vt.撕成,锯,猛地扯开,拆（衣服）vi.裂开，绽线
撕烂, 撕, 撕开, 扯 (verb.); 撕裂, 翻录, 裂口, 扯裂 (noun.)
To rip is to tear or cut something quickly and forcefully, often causing damage or destruction.
Rip means to tear or separate something forcefully or quickly, often resulting in damage or destruction.
n. 裂口，裂缝,vi. 裂开，被撕裂,vt. 撕；锯
